Class GameEngine

java.lang.Object
pl.polsl.lab1.nikodem.chylaszek.guessLan.model.GameEngine
public class GameEngine extends Object
The GameEngine class is responsible for managing the game logic.

    • checkAnswer

      public boolean checkAnswer(String answer)
      Checks the player's answer against the current question's correct answer. Score addition based on usinig/not using hint.
      Parameters:
      answer - The player's answer to the current question.
      Returns:
      True if the answer is correct, false otherwise.
